entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Boxing ValueTypes heavily when calling InheritanceMarginItem.Equals => InheritanceTargetItem.Equals #70559
  • Likely incorrect `MemberNotNullWhen` application on `AttributeData.HasErrors` #70555
  • ```bool IsTargetAttribute(NamedTypeSymbol attributeClass, string namespaceName, string typeName)``` probably should check MetadataName of the type rather than just Name #70554
  • Stack overflow in CSharpSyntaxRewriter when running dotnet format on System.Private.CoreLib.csproj #70549
    17.9

Closed

  • Renamer does not rename method or property symbol references #70390
  • Incorrect suggestion or fix 'Collection initialization can be simplified' for IAsyncEnumerable #70388

PullRequests

Created

  • Apply the GitHub Copilot workaround to new-framework integration tests #70561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle authorization exceptions when reading files #70558
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove incorrect MemberNotNullWhen attribute #70557
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure errors are reported when compiler is unable to emit a required attribute. #70556
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Demonstrating broken formatting. #70551
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Skip code definition window tests blocked by github copilot #70546
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70545
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70560
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure we cache both the last semantic and last embedded-lang classification for a document #70550
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70553
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Clean up inheritance hierarchy for CSharpAttributeData/VisualBasicAttributeData. #70519
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix flakeyness in extract method test #70543
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use collection expression' with await-foreach calls #70494
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce dependency on ImmutableDictionary in CompletionItem's properties storage. #70474
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70548
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix character offset off-by-one error in enhanced line directives #70247
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Skip elements with false conditions during evaluation #70496
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70547
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure diagnostics are logged before proceeding with further project loading #70467
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Attempt to work around GitHub Copilot breaking integration tests #70532
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure evaluation results are included in binlog #70472
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run analyzer consistency checks on .NET Core #70517
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Update some logging in the project system #70445
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP - Remove IObjectWritable #70277
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add external access code action operation for renaming after code actions #70531
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Restrict EnableGenerateDocumentationFile to .NET 8 warning wave #70491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update the approach we use to layer classifications #70522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update arrays in roslyn to use collection expressions #70528
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add async operation listener to allow integration tests to wait for server side operations #70359
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify BKTree.Lookup to pass the threshold to GetEditDistance when there will not be a need for the actual edit distance #70525
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make parent frame available in nested sync `catch` #70513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Fix emit for anonymous indexed delegates #70501
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Add mapCode handler and ExternalAccess.Copilot #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Resolve reference paths to absolute paths #70527
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for \e escape sequences in c# strings and characters #70497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
